Rod F Link: /Profile/RodF428 wrote a review May 2020

Royal Wootton Bassett, United Kingdom2,056 contributions273 helpful votes

A very impressive, small mosque, with some notable features Link: /ShowUserReviews-g672705-d2318618-r753061630-Sheikh_Abdolsamad_Mosque-Natanz_Isfahan_Province.html

Our guide recommended this Ilkhanid mosque, which dates to the C14th. It has the usual 4 iwans around a courtyard, and an octagonal dome as well as the circular main dome. The entrance portal is very impressive. As with other mosques we have visited, it also has a plain winter…

Read more

Date of experience: September 2019

Fitzroy, Australia609 contributions153 helpful votes

Old Find in Natanz Link: /ShowUserReviews-g672705-d2318618-r662449299-Sheikh_Abdolsamad_Mosque-Natanz_Isfahan_Province.html

Natanz village was a real find on our way to Estafan and well worth a visit. It has something missing on the journey from Kashan ...trees !!! The village is attractive and the mosque interesting, mainly due to its age. Under going restoration and a story to tell.

Read more

Date of experience: March 2019

It's beautiful mosque about Mongolia time in iran(800 years ago) Some part of mosque is older means more than 10000 years ago(deylami government) The mosque is in city center and opposite of mosque is fire tempel(char taghi)

Smal Worldclass Gem Link: /ShowUserReviews-g672705-d2318618-r629317305-Sheikh_Abdolsamad_Mosque-Natanz_Isfahan_Province.html

De Iwan Gate of this small mosque with its turquoise en blue 3D Kufi-script tilework is world-class. Insanely beautiful The pointed Roof over the shrine is equally fine. Absolutely worth a detour between Esfahan and Kashan

Exotic P Link: /Profile/ExoticP1 wrote a review Apr 2018

23 contributions2 helpful votes

Exotic Mosque Link: /ShowUserReviews-g672705-d2318618-r573647711-Sheikh_Abdolsamad_Mosque-Natanz_Isfahan_Province.html

I have been there many times. It is a 700-year-old mosque and tomb next to a 2000-year-old tree. It has a 20m minaret and inside is very mysterious. Highly recommended for a tour past Abyaneh on the way from Kashan to Isfahan.
